pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wrap R Tools for Debugging and Parametric Programming // Tools for writing and debugging R code. Provides: 'let()' (converts non-standard evaluation interfaces to parametric standard evaluation interfaces, inspired by 'gtools:strmacro()' and 'base::bquote()'), '%.%' dot-pipe (an 'S3' configurable pipe), 'build_frame()'/'draw_frame()' ('data.frame' example tools), 'qc()' (quoting concatenate), ':=' (named map builder), 'DebugFnW()' (capture function context on error for debugging), and more.
